title: Fa la la la Felt: 45 Handmade Holiday Decorations
description: 'Tis the season to make felt crafts-fa, la la la la! These 45+ festive Christmas projects will bring joy to crafters everywhere. Created by successful online designers from around the world, the adorable items range from a sweet garland of little birds to super-cute matryoshka doll ornaments. All can be made with simple sewing techniques, and there are both no-sew and eco-smart options, too.Both indie and mainstream crafters will love these fresh new ideas!
author: Amanda Carestio
